location: Side area near duck shelter, MaMeeFarm, Thailand
title: grass_overgrowth_maintenance_near_empty_duck_shelter
summary: Overgrown grass near an empty duck shelter requiring routine maintenance.
description: This data unit documents vegetation overgrowth in the area adjacent to a duck shelter at MaMeeFarm. Although the shelter is currently empty, routine grass cutting and area maintenance are required to preserve hygiene, prevent pests, and maintain farm readiness. The activity reflects continuous care independent of active animal presence.

environmental_context.seasonal_condition: dry season with active plant growth

external_reference.note: Overgrown grass near an unused duck shelter.
